function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Impact of pandemic on labor market, supply of materials, and supply of equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unanticipated project delays due to lockdowns and governmental orders","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in uncertainties and disruptions in mega projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of geographical analysis of health and safety violations in certain states","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuating trends in construction-related complaints over time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High concentration of complaints in specific states","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complaints filed online and via email may spread contagious diseases due to shared contact surfaces, such as keyboards and touchscreens.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-person complaints pose a risk of disease transmission through close contact and shared physical spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imminent danger or violation of osha standards in the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of contagious diseases due to improper cleaning and sanitation processes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation or misclassification of data during the pre-processing stage.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personnel reporting to work after testing positive for the virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employers not enforcing social distancing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employers not providing necessary ppe and hygiene facilities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction labor developing health and safety concerns during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of health and safety guidelines","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient communication and awareness about health and safety guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of temperature monitoring for employees","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor workplace hygiene and sanitation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to health and safety guidelines","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of safety wearables and carry-ons","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor communication and awareness about the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 awareness among employees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Noncompliance with safety regulations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing and hygiene measures within the workplace","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of differentiation in safety measures for vaccinated and unvaccinated employees","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response plan for high-level exposure risk tasks and environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
